sleep 10
su - apache -s /bin/bash -c "/usr/share/centreon/bin/console cache:clear"
curl http://localhost/centreon/api/latest/platform/versions
curl http://localhost/centreon/login
centreon -d -u admin -p Centreon\!2021 -a POLLERGENERATE -v 1
su - centreon-gorgone -s /bin/bash -c "sudo service centengine reload"
pkill php-fpm
pkill httpd
service centengine stop
service cbd stop
service mysql stop
sleep 10
